name: Spare Parts Installed Qty
query:
select 
ai.parent as "Asset Code:Link/Asset:300",
a.asset_name as "Asset Name::200",
ai.item as "Item Code:Link/Item:200",
ai.item_group as "Item Group",
ai.item_name as "Item Name::300",
ai.installed_qty as "Installed Qty::200",
IFNULL((select sle.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle where sle.item_code=ai.item order by sle.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Current Stock::200",
IFNULL((select i.warehouse_reorder_level from `tabItem Reorder` i where i.parent=ai.item),0) as "Reorder Level::200",
CASE when(IFNULL((select sle.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle where sle.item_code=ai.item order by sle.creation desc limit 1),0) < IFNULL((select i.warehouse_reorder_level from `tabItem Reorder` i where i.parent=ai.item),0)) THEN "Action Required"
    when ((IFNULL((select sle.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle where sle.item_code=ai.item order by sle.creation desc limit 1),0) > IFNULL((select i.warehouse_reorder_level from `tabItem Reorder` i where i.parent=ai.item),0) and IFNULL((select i.warehouse_reorder_level from `tabItem Reorder` i where i.parent=ai.item),0)) >=1) THEN " "
    when ((IFNULL((select sle.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle where sle.item_code=ai.item order by sle.creation desc limit 1),0) = IFNULL((select i.warehouse_reorder_level from `tabItem Reorder` i where i.parent=ai.item),0) and IFNULL((select i.warehouse_reorder_level from `tabItem Reorder` i where i.parent=ai.item),0)) >=1) THEN ""
    else "Please Update Reorder Level"
END as "Action::300"
from `tabAsset Spares ltem` ai join `tabAsset` as a
on ai.parent = a.name
where ai.item_group like "SPARE PARTS%%"
order by ai.parent;
